block.vs_logistics.fluid_port.tooltip.su: A simple connection point for your _tanks_. Any fluid pumped into it flows straight to the _linked tank_ on your VS ship. To link the tank use a Wrench
block.vs_logistics.fluid_pump.tooltip.be: Moves fluid from the pump _into_ a connected Fluid Port.
_Extracts_ fluid from the connected tank _back into_ the pump.
block.vs_logistics.fluid_pump.tooltip.su: Transfer fluids between the _world_ and your _VS ships_. Switch modes to control the direction of flow.
